Text.Page:
The faeries used to guard the Staff of Isren. Since the argons and Thulsa's troops came through, the faeries turned against us.

The unicorns and their urisk minions scour Darkquaver Woods, preying on travelers and soldiers. That's not normal for unicorns.

I need you to find out why they're acting this way.

These fragments are strange. They emanate argon energy, but there aren't many argons in Darkquaver Woods.

Are these stones influencing the fey races? I must report this at once.
Urisks are numerous, but not particularly durable. The unicorns, however, are dangerous foes. Be cautious and you'll survive.
